abstract: Hector Camacho is among nine nominated to Boxing Hall of Fame.
lead_paragraph: Camacho, who was shot and killed three years ago at age 50 in his native Puerto Rico, heads a class that also includes the two-division champions Lupe Pintor of Mexico and Hilario Zapata of Panama.

headline.main: Hector Camacho Is Among Hall Inductees

snippet: Camacho, who was shot and killed three years ago at age 50 in his native Puerto Rico, heads a class that also includes the two-division champions Lupe Pintor of Mexico and Hilario Zapata of Panama.
